about.title: About me
aboutParagraphs: ~ Hello! I'm Volkan, a 23-year-old Frontend Developer passionate about creating user-friendly and visually appealing web interfaces. Over the past two years — and especially in the past year — I have been focusing on web technologies, developing responsive, accessible, and user-centered web solutions.

~ My journey began with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and has evolved into becoming a proficient developer experienced in using modern tools like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I've also worked with GSAP and Three.js to create engaging animations. Additionally, I have experience developing applications using Firebase and MongoDB. I studied web design and computer programming in both high school and university, which has greatly contributed to my skill set.

~ I adapt quickly to new technologies and learn effortlessly. I take pride in my problem-solving skills, and discipline. When faced with challenges, I analyze their root causes, strive to solve them independently, and consult resources or other tools when necessary.

~ Although I don't have professional work experience yet, my personal projects demonstrate my commitment to quality and innovation. I have a particular interest in visual design and user experience and enjoy exploring backend development.
~ If I have the opportunity to join your team, I aim to contribute as a motivated and collaborative team member, eager to learn and grow alongside your team.
